SEARCH
Package com.shr4pnel.atm

Class Controls

java.lang.Object
com.shr4pnel.atm.Controls
public class Controls extends Object
Controller for interface.fxml and about.fxml Handles all user keypresses, and passes them to Database when necessary
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.4.0
Author:
Tyler

    • handleButtonPress

      public void handleButtonPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles a numeric or function button being pressed on the keypad.
      Parameters:
      event - Passed in automatically on keypress. Represents the button pressed. Used to get the fx:id of the button pressed
